product_name: The North Face Heckler Pack - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Heckler pack is a solid, all-around daypack that's perfect for any occasion. Panel-loading design offers plenty of room for gear and clothing; plus, it has a universal padded sleeve for a laptop up to 15 in. Front pocket features an internal organizer for pens, pencils, wallet, electronics and other necessities. Small front stash pocket and dual mesh water bottle pockets allow quick access to gear. Adjustable shoulder straps and foam back panel with breathable mesh channels deliver ventilation and load-carrying comfort; safety whistle located on chest buckle. Side compression straps help stabilize and control the load. Front tool loop and shockcord secure gear on front of pack for quick access. Waistbelt can be removed when not needed. Reflective accents of The North Face Heckler pack increase your nighttime visibility. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Heckler pack is a solid, all-around daypack that's perfect for any occasion.
